Sponsorships Raffle Contact Show sub menu Contact Us Rental Inquiry Donate Shop Contact Us Scroll Down FLCT at Broward College Fine Arts Theatre 3501 Davie Rd, Bldg 5 Davie, FL 33314 Satellite Facility The Galleria Mall 2542b East Sunrise Blvd Fort Lauderdale, FL 33309 Directions FLCT at Broward College For GPS search for SW 30th St and College Avenue, Davie, FL This will place you at the parking garage across from our building. From I-595 westbound: Exit Davie Road South. Take Davie Road South to Nova Drive. Take Nova Drive West to College Ave. Take College Ave South to SW 30th St. See below for parking. From I-595 eastbound: Exit University Dr South. Take University Dr South to SW 30th St. Take SW 30th St East to College Ave. See below for parking. Parking: Park in the BC Parking Garage on the East side of College Ave at SW 30th St. FLCT is in the Fine Arts Theatre (Bldg 5) across the field from the garage. Do not park in Faculty parking lot. (College will ticket.) Look for the long blue awning. For GPS search for SW 30th St and College Avenue, Davie, FL This will place you at the parking garage. CAMPUS MAP FLCT at The Galleria Mall (Satellite Facility) East on Sunrise Blvd to just before the beach bridge. Enter the mall by turning south at Bayview Dr. Go through the underpass and make your first left. Take the outdoor ramp on your right up to the Lime garage. Go to Level 3 and locate section 3J. (Eastern most side of the garage). Enter the mall there by the elevators and stairs and you will be at the FLCT area. Send a Message To get in touch, use the form below, email us at info@flctstar.org, or give us a call: +1 (954) 763-6882 Contact Us Name * First Last * Last Email * Subject * Message * Are You a Human? Submit If you are human, leave this field blank. Raffle Contact Show sub menu Contact Us Rental Inquiry Donate Shop Teaching The Art Of Life Through The Magic Of Theatre Scroll Down Theatre, Circus and Film Classes for PreK4 and Up Recent Accolades & Feedback “One Of Twelve Great Children’s Theatres Across the US” – Backstage.com Regional Broadway World Award Winner – Broadwayworld.com Teaching Artist Leadership Award – Florida Alliance for Arts Education Ruth Foreman Carbonell Award – Carbonell Awards “Best Children’s Theatre in Florida! Great alumni network and ability to be involved from young to old. Level of instruction and talent very preparatory for careers in the arts. Warm environment, staff that cares!” “My granddaughter went to camp here over the summer and she loved every second of it!! Great, friendly staff and the show was absolutely amazing! Thank you FLCT for such a wonderful program that you run.” “We can’t get over how amazing Monstersongs was! Every performance was extraordinary. I laughed, cried and was wonderfully creeped out! The casting was perfect, and everyone embodied their characters so well. The set, animations, lighting and live video were absolute magic! I am so glad we witnessed it.” STAY CONNECTED Newsletter Sign-up Email * Newsletter Opt-in * I’d like to be added to the FLCT email newsletter list and understand that I can opt-out at anytime. Submit If you are human, leave this field blank. Δ N EXT UP Cabaret October 24th-26th 2025 ON-SALE 9/15/2025 A provocative musical masterpiece… Inside Berlin’s sultry Kit Kat Klub, a charismatic Master of Ceremonies invites patrons to partake in a decadent world of musical numbers, kicklines and torrid affairs — a welcome reprieve from the ever-growing Nazi influence just outside its doors. As the political unrest nears a tipping point, the beautiful life the cabaret promises slowly begins to fade, putting love, friendship and loyalties to the test. REGISTRATION IS OPEN! 2025-2026 Class Offerings View all Class Offerings THE CALL BOARD News, Auditions, Updates and More Beetlejuice, Jr. Audition sign-up is now open! Please click the link below to sign-up for an audition slot and read about the show and audition requirements in the audition application. Audition Application Cabaret casting call! More information and the audition application can be found on our auditions page. Cabaret Casting Call What else is going on around town? Resetting Your Password? Important note: Attempting to reset your password through the "Can't access your account" link on the Office 365 page will not allow the reset to go through successfully. You may reset your password by visiting our Account Activation and Recovery web page. Contact Us Information Technology Room: 3300 585-785-1419 585-394-5005 helpdesk@flcc.edu Helpdesk & Computer Lab Hours Spring/Fall Semesters Mon - Thur: 7:30 a.m. - 7:30 p.m. Fri: 7:30 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. Sat: 9:00 a.m. - 1:00 p.m. Sun: Closed Winter/Summer Sessions Mon-Fri: 8:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. Sat: Closed Sun: Closed Main Campus 3325 Marvin Sands Drive Canandaigua, NY 14424 (585) 394-FLCC Locations Campus Maps Contact Us About FLCC Careers Directory Events News Library Policies and Legal Notices Web Accessibility Nondiscrimination Statement Consumer Information © Finger Lakes Community College.
